function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Maladaptive consumer behaviors exhibited by Survivalists and Rejectionists","Impact":"Increased likelihood of spreading contagious diseases due to non-compliance with health guidelines","Mitigation":"Education and targeted messaging to change consumer behavior, enforcement of health guidelines","Technologies":"Behavioral tracking and analysis, targeted advertising and messaging technologies","People":"Survivalists and Rejectionists, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, marketers, government agencies"},{"Description":"Panic buying as a maladaptive response to the pandemic","Impact":"Disruption of supply chains, scarcity of essential goods, potential for increased community spread during shopping events","Mitigation":"Regulation of purchasing limits, secure supply chain management, public education on responsible shopping behavior","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, online shopping platforms, consumer behavior analysis","People":"Panic buyers, general public","Owner":"Retailers, government agencies, health authorities"},{"Description":"Differences in responses to pandemic based on theoretical constructs","Impact":"Influence on consumer behavior and decision making, potential for non-compliance with health guidelines","Mitigation":"Tailored marketing strategies, targeted messaging based on theoretical constructs, public health education","Technologies":"Data analytics, targeted advertising and marketing tools","People":"Survivalists, Rejectionists, general public","Owner":"Marketers, public health authorities, researchers"}]}
